name: Feeling Gray
description:
You are a Gray,  and you're going get out.

A silly little surreal escape game made in a week for fun. With original art, music (note, just one song) and strange humor, memes and jokes only my siblings will get. Talk to quirky Grays and solves puzzle to get the heck out of there. Short game between 15 to 30 minutes long.
 
Controls
Movement                         -   Arrow Keys
Interact/Use item                       -   Z & A
Menu/ Use Inventory                       -   X

This is my first released game! Feedback is welcome!
